code: @Override public RestChannelConsumer prepareRequest(RestRequest request, NodeClient client) throws IOException {     UpgradeRequest upgradeReq = new UpgradeRequest(Strings.splitStringByCommaToArray(request.param("index"))).     upgradeReq.indicesOptions(IndicesOptions.fromRequest(request, upgradeReq.indicesOptions())).     upgradeReq.upgradeOnlyAncientSegments(request.paramAsBoolean("only_ancient_segments", false)).     return channel -> client.admin().indices().upgrade(upgradeReq, new RestToXContentListener<>(channel)). }
